components.title: Iron Legion Security Platform
components.description: AI-powered Kubernetes security automation platform with three JSA agent types (DevSec, InfraSec, SecOps) supervised by JADE AI.
components.purpose: Automate FedRAMP compliance enforcement across CI/CD, admission control, and runtime layers.

control-implementations.description: Iron Legion control satisfaction for FedRAMP Moderate

implemented-requirements.description: JSA-DevSec enforces tenant-scoped ServiceAccount assignment via OPA policy ac2_account_management.rego. Kyverno enforce-tenant-isolation.yaml blocks workloads without tenant labels at admission. Gatekeeper K8sTenantIsolation constraint prevents default SA usage. JSA-SecOps reports account compliance status weekly.

Three-layer enforcement: OPA ac6_least_privilege.rego validates in CI, Kyverno require-least-privilege.yaml and block-privileged-containers.yaml enforce at admission, Gatekeeper K8sLeastPrivilege blocks non-compliant pods. Covers: runAsNonRoot, drop ALL caps, no privileged, readOnlyRootFilesystem, no hostPID/hostNetwork/hostIPC.

OPA au2_audit_events.rego requires Falco monitoring annotation and audit sidecars. Kyverno require-audit-logging.yaml mutates pods to inject falco.org/monitored annotation. JSA-InfraSec Falco rules detect 6 threat categories with MITRE ATT&CK mapping. All audit events feed into Elasticsearch per-tenant indices.

OPA cm6_configuration_settings.rego enforces resource limits, required labels (app, version, tenant, owner), immutable image tags, and approved registries. Kyverno require-resource-limits.yaml enforces at admission. Configuration baselines documented in policy-as-code.

OPA sc7_boundary_protection.rego validates default-deny NetworkPolicy annotations, blocks NodePort/LoadBalancer services, and enforces tenant namespace isolation. Kyverno enforce-network-boundaries.yaml and Gatekeeper K8sNetworkBoundaries constraint provide admission-time enforcement. JSA-InfraSec Falco rules detect cross-tenant network access.

OPA sc8_transmission_confidentiality.rego requires TLS on all Ingress, mTLS annotations on Services, blocks plaintext ports, and verifies service mesh sidecar presence. Kyverno require-tls-everywhere.yaml and Gatekeeper K8sRequireTLS constraint enforce at admission. Istio service mesh provides mTLS for all pod-to-pod communication.

OPA si2_flaw_remediation.rego blocks mutable image tags, unapproved registries, and images without Trivy scan annotations. JSA-DevSec runs Trivy CVE scanning and Semgrep SAST in CI. Findings are mapped to NIST controls via jsa-secops/scan-and-map.py and classified by Iron Legion rank for prioritized remediation.

JSA-InfraSec deploys Falco DaemonSet with 6 custom rules covering shell execution, crypto mining, sensitive file access, privilege escalation, cross-tenant network access, and unexpected outbound connections. OPA si4_system_monitoring.rego requires Prometheus scrape annotations, log-collection sidecars, and health probes. Runtime alerts are mapped to Iron Legion ranks via runtime-policies.yaml.

components.title: JSA-DevSec Agent
components.description: Pre-deployment security scanning agent. Runs Trivy, Semgrep, Gitleaks, and Conftest in CI pipelines.
components.purpose: Shift-left security: catch vulnerabilities and misconfigurations before deployment.

components.title: JSA-InfraSec Agent
components.description: Runtime security enforcement agent. Manages Falco rules, NetworkPolicy, and incident response.
components.purpose: Detect and respond to runtime threats in the Kubernetes cluster.

components.title: JSA-SecOps Agent
components.description: Compliance reporting agent. Runs scan-and-map, collects evidence, generates OSCAL artifacts.
components.purpose: Continuous compliance monitoring and 3PAO evidence preparation.

components.title: JADE AI Supervisor
components.description: AI supervisor with C-rank maximum authority. Approves C-rank actions, escalates B-S rank to human.
components.purpose: Automated security decision-making within defined authority boundaries.
